name: Northeast Community Federal Credit Union
description: North East Community Federal Credit Union is a Community Development Chartered Credit Union that exists to meet the unmet savings and credit needs of its membership. As a financial cooperative dedicated to serving the underserved, NECFCU is also an agent for community revitalization and development within its field of membership and for the larger community.
